oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial of Tennessee State Capitol area and the Nashville Reservoir, 1961 January 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial photograph of the Tennessee State Capitol Building area in downtown Nashville, as well as a prominent view of the Nashville Reservoir, located on a hill above 8th Avenue South (round structure). Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
Central business districts--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Architecture--Tennessee--Nashville; Reservoirs--Tennessee--Nashville; Neighborhoods--Tennessee--Nashville
